00020 
00021 CreateConfigurationDialog::CreateConfigurationDialog(LibraryInterface* handler,
00022                                                                                                          QSharedPointer<Component> component,
00023                                                                                                          QWidget *parent,
00024                                                                                                          Qt::WindowFlags f):
00025 QDialog(parent, f),
00026 handler_(handler),
00027 component_(component),
00028 useExistingRadio_(tr("Use current design"), this),
00029 createNewRadio_(tr("Create new design"), this),
00030 createCopyRadio_(tr("Copy old design to new configuration"), this),
00031 configNameEdit_(this),
00032 vlnvEdit_(VLNV::DESIGNCONFIGURATION, handler, this, this, true),
00033 implementationCombo_(this),
00034 okButton_(QIcon(":/icons/graphics/ok.png"), tr("Ok"), this),
00035 cancelButton_(QIcon(":/icons/graphics/cancel.png"), tr("Cancel"), this) {
00036 
00037         Q_ASSERT(component);
00038         Q_ASSERT(handler);
00039 
00040         setupLayout();
00041         setupConnections();
00042 
00043         // by default an existing design is used.
00044         useExistingRadio_.toggle();
00045 
00046         // set the views to the combo box
00047         implementationCombo_.addItem(QString(""));
00048         implementationCombo_.addItems(component->getViewNames());
00049 
00050         // set the title for vlnv editor
00051         vlnvEdit_.setTitle(tr("Configuration VLNV"));
00052         VLNV compVLNV = *component_->getVlnv();
00053         vlnvEdit_.setVendor(compVLNV.getVendor());
00054         vlnvEdit_.setLibrary(compVLNV.getLibrary());
00055         vlnvEdit_.setVersion(compVLNV.getVersion());
00056 
00057         setWindowTitle(tr("Create new configuration"));
00058 }

00060 CreateConfigurationDialog::~CreateConfigurationDialog() {
00061 }

00063 void CreateConfigurationDialog::setupLayout() {
00064 
00065         QHBoxLayout* radioLayout = new QHBoxLayout();
00066         radioLayout->addWidget(&useExistingRadio_);
00067         radioLayout->addWidget(&createNewRadio_);
00068         radioLayout->addWidget(&createCopyRadio_);
00069         radioLayout->addStretch();
00070 
00071         QFormLayout* nameLayout = new QFormLayout();
00072         nameLayout->addRow(tr("Configuration name:"), &configNameEdit_);
00073 
00074         QFormLayout* comboLayout = new QFormLayout();
00075         comboLayout->addRow(tr("OPTIONAL reference to this component's\n"
00076                 "top-level implementation view"), &implementationCombo_);
00077 
00078         QHBoxLayout* buttonLayout = new QHBoxLayout();
00079         buttonLayout->addStretch();
00080         buttonLayout->addWidget(&okButton_, 0, Qt::AlignRight);
00081         buttonLayout->addWidget(&cancelButton_, 0, Qt::AlignRight);
00082 
00083         QVBoxLayout* topLayout = new QVBoxLayout(this);
00084         topLayout->addLayout(radioLayout);
00085         topLayout->addLayout(nameLayout);
00086         topLayout->addWidget(&vlnvEdit_);
00087         topLayout->addLayout(comboLayout);
00088         topLayout->addLayout(buttonLayout);
00089 }
00090 
00091 void CreateConfigurationDialog::setupConnections() {
00092 
00093         connect(&okButton_, SIGNAL(clicked(bool)),
00094                 this, SLOT(onOk()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00095         connect(&cancelButton_, SIGNAL(clicked(bool)),
00096                 this, SLOT(reject()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00097         connect(&configNameEdit_, SIGNAL(textEdited(const QString&)),
00098                 this, SLOT(onConfNameChanged(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00099 }
00100 
00101 void CreateConfigurationDialog::onOk() {
00102         QStringList errorList = validate();
00103 
00104         // if errors were found
00105         if (!errorList.isEmpty()) {
00106                 QString errorText(tr("The following errors were found in the dialog:\n"));
00107                 foreach (QString error, errorList) {
00108                         errorText += ("- " + error + "\n");
00109                 }
00110 
00111                 QMessageBox::critical(this, tr("Invalid dialog input"), errorText);
00112         }
00113         // if no errors were found
00114         else 
00115                 accept();
00116 }

00118 VLNV CreateConfigurationDialog::getConfigurationVLNV() const {
00119         VLNV configVLNV = vlnvEdit_.getVLNV();
00120         configVLNV.setType(VLNV::DESIGNCONFIGURATION);
00121         return configVLNV;
00122 }
00123 
00124 QString CreateConfigurationDialog::getConfigurationName() const {
00125         return configNameEdit_.text();
00126 }
00127 
00128 QString CreateConfigurationDialog::getImplementationViewName() const {
00129         return implementationCombo_.currentText();
00130 }
00131 
00132 QStringList CreateConfigurationDialog::validate() const {
00133         QStringList errors;
00134 
00135         if (configNameEdit_.text().isEmpty()) {
00136                 errors.append(tr("A name for the configuration has to be specified."));
00137         }
00138 
00139         // if component already has a view with given name
00140         if (component_->findView(configNameEdit_.text())) {
00141                 errors.append(tr("Component already has a configuration named %1.").arg(
00142                         configNameEdit_.text()));
00143         }
00144 
00145         VLNV configVLNV = vlnvEdit_.getVLNV();
00146         // if configuration vlnv is not valid
00147         if (!configVLNV.isValid()) {
00148                 errors.append(tr("The vlnv given for the configuration is not valid."));
00149         }
00150         // if vlnv was valid
00151         else {
00152 
00153                 // if given VLNV is reserved
00154                 if (handler_->contains(configVLNV)) {
00155                         errors.append(tr("The vlnv given for the configuration is reserved."));
00156                 }
00157 
00158                 // is user wants to create a new design.
00159                 if (!useExistingRadio_.isChecked()) {
00160                         
00161                         VLNV designVLNV = getDesignVLNV();
00162                         if (handler_->contains(designVLNV)) {
00163                                 errors.append(tr("The vlnv for the new design is reserved."));
00164                         }
00165                 }
00166 
00167         }
00168         return errors;
00169 }
00170 
00171 VLNV CreateConfigurationDialog::getDesignVLNV() const {
00172         // first get the inputted values
00173         VLNV designVLNV = getConfigurationVLNV();
00174         designVLNV.setType(VLNV::DESIGN);
00175 
00176         // remove the possible ".designcfg" from the end
00177         QString name = designVLNV.getName().remove(QString(".designcfg"));
00178 
00179         // add .design to the end
00180         designVLNV.setName(name + ".design");
00181         return designVLNV;
00182 }
00183 
00184 void CreateConfigurationDialog::onConfNameChanged( const QString& newName ) {
00185         vlnvEdit_.setName(component_->getVlnv()->getName() + "." + newName + ".designcfg");
00186 }
00187 
00188 CreateConfigurationDialog::DesignSelection CreateConfigurationDialog::designSelection() const {
00189         if (useExistingRadio_.isChecked())
00190                 return CreateConfigurationDialog::USE_EXISTING;
00191         else if (createNewRadio_.isChecked())
00192                 return CreateConfigurationDialog::CREATE_EMPTY;
00193         else
00194                 return CreateConfigurationDialog::CREATE_COPY;
00195 }
